Question
========
Which phase of the SDLC focuses on monitoring application performance after deployment?

Answerlist
----------
* Requirements Gathering
* Design
* Development
* Testing
* Monitoring and Maintenance

Solution
========
The Monitoring and Maintenance phase focuses on monitoring application performance after deployment, ensuring that the application runs smoothly and efficiently.
